name: Five Nights At Spongebob (Wisienki2ie)
description:
You are a security guard at the brand new "Kursty Crab FUN" restaurant.

Your job is to monitor the place ya know, make sure everything is fine and normal except... there are animatronics that are trying to kill you, yea thats rather bad 

Also avaiable on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/655812628

PS. Saving is not implemented yet ._.
